title: Person of Interest : Where is the Baby ?
author: The69Observer
comment:
"I told you to move your arsenal."
"I was going to."
"When? After the whole place is blown up?"
It's like a married couple arguing about where not to leave the tool box.

"that's a grenade!"
"It's just a tear-gas grenade..."
"IT'S STILL A GRENADE!!!"
I LOVE this scene! And the one where Carter is like "John?! John? You left a baby with John?"
Person of Interest: the only show about crime and government conspiracies where a main character panics and kidnaps a baby
I never realized in this episode how much of a married couple response they were in lol.  Good times :)
description: This week's person of interest is a toddler. What better way to protect her then to have our favorite vigilante couple... babysit ?
